title: Mr. Right. Official Featurette [HD] (2016)
description:
In theaters: April 8th, 2016

Description:

Hyperactive at the best of times, Martha has gone full-on manic since her latest breakup. She babbles, parties like a monster, cooks everything in sightâ€”and is looking to do something terrible when she meets Francis. To anyone else, Francisâ€™s approach would come across as creepy, but Martha canâ€™t help but be intrigued. They seem a perfect match: she's bananas, he's bananas... except he's a deadly sort of bananas. Heâ€™s a professional assassin. Francis is a hitman with a cause: he unexpectedly kills the people ordering the hits. Just as Martha begins to realize her new beau wasn't joking when he said he had to step out for a moment to shoot someone, things start heating up for Francis. His services are solicited by a dubious client who's being sought by an equally dubious FBI agent. As the bodies pile up, Martha needs to decide whether to flee or join in the mayhem.

Director: Paco Cabezas

Writers: Max Landis

Actors: Sam Rockwell, Anna Kendrick, Tim Roth, James Ransone, Anson Mount, Michael Eklund, RZA

Genre: Comedy, Action and Adventure

Run Time: 1 hour 33 minutes
